summary: In the 13th month of the 13th year of a new millennium, humans battle a world of demons.
cast: Trae Ireland|Erin Coker|Jody Barton|Nihilist Gelo|Bill Voorhees|Tiffany Martinez|Jared Cohn|Calico Cooper|Micah Fitzgerald|Ian Roberts|Darren Reul|Benjamin Norris|Gregory DePetro|John Andrew Vaas|JD Fairman|Chuck Pappas|Jessica Cameron|Jackie Bressack|David Brite|Buz Wallick|Veronica Ricci|Jack Miller|Cory Jacob|Mildraide Lazarre|Tim Lott|Kori Agee|Benji Alvarado|Natasha Beauboeuf|Ryan Budds|Scott Engrotti|Edra Fiocca|Patrice Gibbs|Cory Graham|Joe Rudy Guerrero Jr.|Dan Madonia|Rebecca Olejniczak|Antonio Reed|Shaun Rylee|James Cullen Bressack
